== Basic set cookie ==

{{{

$.cookie('the_cookie', 'the_value');

}}}

== Set cookie with options ==

{{{

$.cookie('the_cookie', 'the_value', { expires: 7, path: '/', domain: 'jquery.com', secure: true });

}}}


== Unset cookie ==

{{{

$.cookie('the_cookie', null);

}}}
